Rating: PG-13 (Disturbing Images|Brief Strong Language|Some Suggestive Content|Terror|Violence)
Synopsis: Kate Mandell takes a job as a nanny for two young orphans at an isolated Gothic mansion in the Maine countryside. She soon learns that the children -- Miles and Flora -- are emotionally distant and unstable. When strange events start to plague Kate and the siblings, she begins to suspect that the estate's dark corridors are home to a malevolent entity.
Title: The Turning
